Sentencas: Electrodeposited Co and Mn spinel phase oxides for application as coatings for metallic interconnectors in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells were prepared.
Titulo: Electrodeposition and isothermal aging of Co and Mn layers on stainless steel for interconnectors: Initial stages of spinel phase formation

Sentencas: The study aims at understanding the initial stages of transformation of the metallic layers into the spinel phase.
Titulo: Electrodeposition and isothermal aging of Co and Mn layers on stainless steel for interconnectors: Initial stages of spinel phase formation

Sentencas: Co and Mn metallic layers were sequentially deposited over AISI 430 stainless steel substrate from acidic sulfate solutions and annealed in oxidizing and inert atmospheres between 600 degrees C and 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrodeposition and isothermal aging of Co and Mn layers on stainless steel for interconnectors: Initial stages of spinel phase formation

Sentencas: The coatings obtained showed a thickness above 20 mu m. After 1 h of isothermal aging the coatings were composed of layers of un-reacted metallic elements and Mn based oxides.
Titulo: Electrodeposition and isothermal aging of Co and Mn layers on stainless steel for interconnectors: Initial stages of spinel phase formation

Sentencas: The spinet phase was studied by XRD and revealed Mn based tetragonal structure Mn3O4 with Co in solid solution and a non-determined Co/Mn ratio.
Titulo: Electrodeposition and isothermal aging of Co and Mn layers on stainless steel for interconnectors: Initial stages of spinel phase formation

Sentencas: According to EDS measurements this ratio should vary with depth.
Titulo: Electrodeposition and isothermal aging of Co and Mn layers on stainless steel for interconnectors: Initial stages of spinel phase formation

Sentencas: Full conversion was not obtained at these time frames with the presence other Mn oxides (MnO and Mn2O3).
Titulo: Electrodeposition and isothermal aging of Co and Mn layers on stainless steel for interconnectors: Initial stages of spinel phase formation

Sentencas: In inert atmosphere, the allotropic Mn transformation from alpha to beta phase was detected.
Titulo: Electrodeposition and isothermal aging of Co and Mn layers on stainless steel for interconnectors: Initial stages of spinel phase formation

Sentencas: No outward diffusion of Cr was detected, due to the short exposure times.
Titulo: Electrodeposition and isothermal aging of Co and Mn layers on stainless steel for interconnectors: Initial stages of spinel phase formation
